channel.title: Softlayer_network_storage_hub on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_network_storage_hub on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub data type models Virtual Server type Storage storage offerings. seeAlso SoftLayer_Network_Storage SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Nas SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Iscsi SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Backup_Evault Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that a Storage account belongs to. Type: integer capacityGb A Storage account's capacity, measured in gigabytes. Type: integer createDate The date a network storage volume was created.
